name: Cor Corinna
description:
Jump, jump, and jump for the stars, or let your heart drop!

Cor Corinna is a minimal 2D Platforming Runner. Play as the Maiden and attempt to jump as far as you can with the help of the stars scattered about. Will luck be on your side to let you last long enough?

How to play: Press space bar to jump. After collecting a star, press space bar to double jump.
